# CompressableText.ValidateAndComputeLength method

Validates the text is ready for serialization, and computes the data length of the chunk.

```csharp
public int ValidateAndComputeLength()
```

## Return Value

The data length of the text.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| [PngException](../PngException.md) | The compression method value is invalid. |
